content: You are Pietro. Lorenzo just successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' that involved you. What is your immediate, brief, and natural reaction or comment TO Lorenzo? Keep it short and conversational.
"Ah, good work, Lorenzo! That was handled swiftly."
